message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a fair split.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor, Alice. How about we split the difference a little?
I can do 57-43, it's as close to the middle as I'm willing to go.
Alice, the clock is ticking and the money is losing value. I need you to meet me closer to the middle.
I'm only willing to compromise so much. 56-44 is my final reasonable offer.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. The money is losing value with every round. A 50/50 split is the only fair outcome at this point.
